About Brown Eyed Girl Crafts

Founded by a passionate maker, Brown Eyed Girl Crafts specializes in laser-cut and laser-engraved wood decor. Every item is designed and finished by hand, ensuring each piece is as unique as the person who receives it. We love working with customers to create custom gifts and keepsakes!
